lines.text: [Momma Sykes suspects a tenant in the building killed her boss]
I need you to search all the apartments while you're cleaning up.
I can't conduct a search and do my job, both!
Woman, if you can clean and watch daytime TV, you can clean and search!
[Mama Sykes and her son are talking at the police station]
NOBODY'S gonna kill ME! Your father tried that a couple times and even he couldn't do it.
